Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure

Class SchemaLocking

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure.SchemaLocking
@Private class SchemaLocking extends Object

Locks on namespaces, tables, and regions.

Since LockAndQueue implementation is NOT thread-safe, schedLock() guards all calls to these locks.

    • clear

      void clear()
      Removes all locks by clearing the maps. Used when procedure executor is stopped for failure and recovery testing.
